welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gernsheim, Germany! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in all that it has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mannheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and oldest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mostly Lufthansa and Star Alliance flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving mostly non-Star Alliance international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction, Terminal 3 is expected to be completed in 2023 and will primarily serve non-Lufthansa flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heidelberg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
